lead_paragraph: A new-style pulp fiction in Malaysia has tapped into a desire for escapism among younger Malaysians as their country has become more socially conservative.

headline.print_headline: Malaysians Seek Escape in Pulp Fiction as Government’s Grip Tightens
headline.main: Malaysians Seek Escape in Pulp Fiction as Government’s Grip Tightens

snippet: A new-style pulp fiction in Malaysia has tapped into a desire for escapism among younger Malaysians as their country has become more socially conservative.
abstract: New style of pulp fiction books is catching on among young, disaffected Malaysian Muslims looking for escapism as their country becomes more socially conservative; tales of crime, sex and horror, often tinged with social criticism, are published by independent publishing industry and sold in pop-up stores.
